name: Capital West Advisors
overview:
Capital West Advisers focuses on a wide array of industries and all stages of growth. Capital West Advisors is headquartered in Los Angeles, CA and has satellite offices in San Francisco, Chicago, and New York. Our clients range from entrepreneurial start-ups to multi-national corporations and we are well-equipped to work with clients anywhere across the United States and around the world.

CWA far exceeds the limited scope of business plan writing by providing each of our clients with business coaching, fundraising advice, business development consulting, and access to our vast network of esteemed affiliate partners. Additionally, Capital West Advisors provides an array of additional writing services including: drafting grant proposals, brochure content, website content, and PowerPoint investor slide presentations.

CWA also boasts a vast network of over 800 venture capital firms and 75 angel networks (which are comprised of thousands of accredited investors), which we utilize in our attempts to procure capital on behalf of our clients.

milestones.description: Introduces investor network of 950 VC's and 90 Angel Investors.
milestones.source_description: Capital West Advisors conveys the importance of a strong Market section in a business plan
